accounts.Title: Accounts
accounts.DeletionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all data for that allycode that is stored in your browser? (mods, toons, character selections and targets)
accounts.DeletionExplanation1: You will be able to restore the character and mod data by fetching with this allycode again.
accounts.DeletionExplanation2: The rest will be lost unless you make a backup first.

backup.Title: Backups & Reset
backup.ResetExplanation: This will delete all data stored in your browser. All stored mods-manager data will be lost unless you make a file-backup first.
